msbt.message: Doesn't spring make you feel like everything is all sparkly and new?
Tell you what else is looking sparkly! It's legit you, ! Spring is WAY your season!
'K, spring sparkles are SO le beaut. I see them everywhere! I can even feel them if I think hard enough!
I'm working on a new song called Sparkletime—SpringSparkles. So far, I've got the title.
Summer brings the HEAT! Makes you want one of those things! You know what I mean, right?
A tasty ! It's extra delish after dance practice!
Some frozen !Actually, you could totes shove a couple bags under your armpits and stay cool all day!
Once I'm a pop star, someone's eventually going ask me, "What's the best part about fall?"
Fall fashion, duh! It's the one time all year I can wear my "It's Fall Y'all!" sweatshirt and not get funny looks!
The leaves! Rake up a big pile, jump in, then don't come out for days! The perfect hiding spot
Sweaters! If you find one big enough, you can wear it during the dayand use it like a tent at night!
Winter's SO FAB! Sledding, snowball fights, sweaters, firesit's all great!
I love walks in the snow—holding hands with someone, wiping away my drippy nose goo before they see it
If it wasn't freezing outside at night, how would you appreciate your big, warm, fluffy bed?
Winter tip! Save a snowball in the freezer until summer, then blow everybody's minds!
♪ Winter went, and spring has come! Let's celebrate by doing something dumb! ♪What? It kind of rhymed. Shut up.
My dumb idea is that I'm going to wear flowers on my head and declare myself Queen of Spring!BOW BEFORE ME, YOU TINY SPRINGTIME MORTALS!
You know what? I so need to check all my pitfall traps I buried last year to make sure they still work.
Summer is going full blast! That means it's tiiime fooor
DUH! A music festival! So cool! I might headline You know, if we can work out the schedule.
A glam tan! Slap on that suntan oil, get that sparkle going, and bake in the sun! Without overdoing it, obvs!
I figured out how to stay warm! I just keep dancing all the time! Never stop. Just dancing. Forever.
The bugs are loving that springtime warmth! I'm loving it too!
It's summer! You know what that means, !BUGS! Buzzing all over and flying up in your face asking for a bite of your corn on the cob.

Fall makes me feel all sentimental. You ever think about that word? Sentimental?It's from 1749, which sounds like a low score, not a year—but they don't let me make the calendars! Anyhoo "Sentement" is the French spelling from the 1400s! And THAT'S from the Latin "senti," aka feel, B-T-dubs.I read all of this in a magazine I found on the bus. I'd totes left my phone at home and had to make do.Aww, I just realized I'm kind of sentimental about that bus trip.
Winter fact one! Winter air is all dry because the moisture totes froze up! Winter fact two! I made fact one up!
Springtime means there's love in the air WHAAAAA-CHOOOO! And pollen too!

Springtime! The season of looove. I wonder why that is? Maybe cupids hibernate?Are cupids their own species, or are they just babies who can fly?<10_4 /> Never mind! I just had the best idea!Me. Onstage. Cupids fly up behind me, lifting a banner that says WORLD'S GREATEST POP STAR!
Fall's such a comfy season. I love being able to dress up all warm and snuggly. Oh, but don't get too carried away. If you put on too many sweaters, you'll fall over!
It's getting grody cold lately that must mean it's almost winter.So, hey, I'm trying that phrase out. "Grody cold." Pretty fab, right?
